changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE spring."articles" ( "id" INTEGER GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 11) NOT NULL, "title" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "content" TEXT NOT NULL, "author" VARCHAR(100), "published_date" TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(), "is_published" BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, CONSTRAINT "articles_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("id") );
